column4: Why would I not have permission to create a folder on my desktop, this is a fresh install of Ub
you do - jsut right click, create folder
That much I know, It will not give permission
can you give me the last one I asked?
it's owned by root for some reason
of course it is - did you use sudo ?
and we get to try and pick up the pieces for the 10% failure rate... :(
